snippet: Kirby Delauter, a county official who claimed he would sue a newspaper for publishing his name, said on Wednesday that his Facebook post was “was wrong and inappropriate.”
abstract: Kirby Delauter, Republican councilman in Frederick County, Md, who threatened to sue newspaper for publishing his name, takes back threat after his Facebook post is mocked across social media.
lead_paragraph: Kirby Delauter, a county official who claimed he would sue a newspaper for publishing his name, said on Wednesday that his Facebook post was “was wrong and inappropriate.”

headline.main: Maryland: Councilman Recants Threat to Sue Newspaper
